titles.title: Returning to the Senate the bill S. 1030.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on the privileged resolution which directs that the House return the bill S. 1030 and accompanying papers to the Senate because the contents of that bill violate the privileges of the House under the Constitution with regard to revenues.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/21/1994--Introduced. Returns S. 1030 (Veterans Health Programs Improvement Act of 1994) to the Senate because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, it contravenes the Constitution and infringes on the privileges of the House.
